rows.label: bf07390100_0010
rows.name: My name is Adel. I am long departed from this world.

rows.label: bf07390100_0050
rows.name:
I've been here before.
This is Eden!

rows.label: bf07390100_0060
rows.name: Homura was standing under that tree, over there.

rows.label: bf07390100_0080
rows.name:
Is that so?
I must offer my gratitude.

rows.label: bf07390100_0100
rows.name:
You are the one who brought me here.
I have never been to this place.

rows.label: bf07390100_0110
rows.name: Once, I sought to come here, but I never did.

rows.label: bf07390100_0130
rows.name:
Neither have I.
Not... Not yet.

rows.label: bf07390100_0160
rows.name: Rex, what is it that you seek?

rows.label: bf07390100_0180
rows.name: Errr... I don't really get that kinda thing.

rows.label: bf07390100_0240
rows.name: Gramps, Nia, Tora, everyone in Iyasaki...

rows.label: bf07390100_0270
rows.name: Everyone in Avaritia used to tell me that.

rows.label: bf07390100_0280
rows.name:
It is not necessary to protect everything.
There is a limit to what one man can do.

rows.label: bf07390100_0300
rows.name: But, there is something granted to you especially.

rows.label: bf07390100_0310
rows.name: Please, tell me what it is.

rows.label: bf07390100_0330
rows.name: She is afraid. Of her own power and her terrible destiny.

rows.label: bf07390100_0340
rows.name:
And I, too, was afraid.
I feared the true power of the Holy Grail.

rows.label: bf07390100_0350
rows.name: Your will to fight comes from your will to protect.

rows.label: bf07390100_0360
rows.name:
When you take on the weight of all the fear she
carries, then you will be her true Driver.
